thread.title: VIDEO: Group of brutes pummel, stab man on Brooklyn street
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Group of brutes pummel, stab man on Brooklyn street

author: JOHN ANNESE
title: VIDEO: Group of brutes pummel, stab man on Brooklyn street
text:
NEW YORK DAILY NEWS   7:11 AM 
A vicious beat down and stabbing was captured on surveillance video in Brooklyn and police are asking for the public's help identifying the suspects. 
The 26-year-old victim was pummeled and knifed several times after a melee broke out at the corner of Mother Gaston Blvd. and Belmont Ave. in Brownsville at about 8:35 p.m. Monday, cops said. 
Footage shows the man on the ground, surrounded by a group who pounded and kicked him as he tried to roll away. 
The men scattered, and medics took the victim to Brookdale Hospital in critical condition, cops said. Surveillance video captured a group of brutes viciously beating and stabbing a man on a Brooklyn street. (DCPI) 
Police wouldn't speculate on a motive for the assault. 
Detectives are asking anyone with information to call Crime Stoppers at (800) 577-TIPS. Tags:
